A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Garbage.  Total garbage.

There were a few good scenes\, especially between Rey and Kylo Ren\, but there were so many flaws that those good parts cannot make up for the rest of this mess.

The biggest problem I had with this movie is that there was no heart or soul to it.  It really didn't go anywhere and definitely didn't make me feel anything beyond disappointment.

Please\, don't support this film.  The only way to get Disney to revisit the direction of Star Wars is to hurt them financially.
